directions: Blend 1/2 cup shredded coconut, coconut oil, almonds, coconut milk, dates, and sweetener in the bowl of a food processor until creamy, about 2 minutes. Freeze until set, about 15 minutes.
Shape mixture into 1-inch balls; roll into remaining 1/2 cup shredded coconut.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®)
title: Chocolate, Almond, and Coconut Vegan Fat Bombs
